name: molecule-classifier
description: This API classifies molecules as proteins, carbohydrates or lipids based on the "weight" of the molecule. Molecules with weights that are multiples of 3 shall be classified as proteins. Molecules with weights that are multiples of 5 shall be classified as carbohydrates. Molecules with weights that are both multiples of both 3 and 5 shall be classified as lipids. In any other case the molecule shall be classified as a nucleic acid.
author: Eric Farrar
